feed.title: Combined summary - Bitcoin Knots "Steel Rope" LTS 21.2.knots20210629 released

entry.title: Combined summary - Bitcoin Knots "Steel Rope" LTS 21.2.knots20210629 released
entry.summary: Bitcoin Knots has recently released their new version 21.2.knots20210629, which is a Long Term Support (LTS) "Steel Rope" release. The updated version contains bug fixes and updated translations while maintaining the same feature set as its predecessor from June 29th, 2021. Users are urged to report any bugs using the issue tracker on GitHub and subscribe to receive security and update notifications. The LTS release, also known as the “Steel Rope” release, is designed to be supported for an extended period. It ensures that users have access to critical bug fixes and security updates, even after the newer versions are released. The Bitcoin Knots team encourages users to download the updated version to benefit from the improved features.To access the full release notes and change log, interested parties can visit the Bitcoin Knots GitHub page. The change log details all the necessary changes made in the new version. It also assists users to understand the improvements made in the latest version. Overall, the new Bitcoin Knots version provides users with improved performance and security. With the LTS release, users can rest assured that they will receive continued support and updates for the foreseeable future.
